settings.button_label: Book a time with us at CES 2025

settings.image_banner_des: We specialize in high-performance gaming gear, including gaming desks, ergonomic chairs, precision keyboards and mice, and smart ambient lighting systems. Each product is designed to enhance your gaming experience, whether for home use or professional competition. Visit our booth to explore the future of gaming technology and unlock your full potential!

settings.title: Discover Our Exhibitors and Navigate the Venue

settings.heading: The World's First Sync-Light Gaming Desk
settings.text: Transform your gaming space with a desk that breathes life into your games. Synchronized lighting pulses with every move, immersing you in a world where desk and game become one.

settings.image_banner_title: The Innovative Experiences Presented by Blacklyte
settings.image_banner_des: At CES, our gaming showcase merges performance and ambiance – introducing the next-gen of Sync-Light desks, ergonomic gaming chair and PC peripherals.

settings.heading: The Ergonomic Oasis: A Chair for the Modern Gladiator
settings.text: Designed with the modern gladiator in mind, our ergonomic chairs offer an oasis of comfort. They cradle your body in support, ensuring that you can maintain peak performance throughout your gaming endeavors.

settings.heading: Precision Instruments for the Modern Gladiator
settings.text: Arm yourself with our range of high-precision PC peripherals, designed to meet the demands of the most intense gaming sessions. From mechanical keyboards to responsive mice, each piece is a testament to engineering excellence.

settings.section_description: Get special offers, exclusive product news, and event info straight to your inbox.
